cycle-comment-styles.singleLineCommentSt.description: Behavior with single-line comments. By default, comment styles cycle on each command invocation. Valid values are `default`, `//`, `/*`, and `/**`. Changes require a reload of VS Code to take effect.

cycle-comment-styles.multiLineCommentSty.description: Behavior with multi-line comments. By default, comment styles cycle on each command invocation. Valid values are `default`, `//`, and `/**`. Changes require a reload of VS Code to take effect.

cycle-comment-styles.collapsedLineSepara.description:
Behavior with collapsing multi-line comments. Every 
 line of a multi-line comment is collapsed into a single line, with this string as the separator. Changes require a reload of VS Code to take effect.
